info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Delta County through 700 PM MDT... At 629 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orchard City, or 27 miles north of Montrose, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Orchard City around 640 PM MDT. Cedaredge around 645 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 67 and 70. Colorado 65 between mile markers 1 and 12. Colorado 92 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
